newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse trade thin, index little changed.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse trade thin, index little changed.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange index on Friday closed little changed in thin trade for the first day of the fasting month of Ramadan, bourse sources said.
The market's 30-share index closed at 556.41 from 556.18 on Thursday.
Trade volume was 502,867 dinars against 1.88 million dinars.
As consumption was expected to rise in Ramadan, so did retail stores Monoprix share which gained 1.5 dinar to 33 dinars. But beer bottler SFBT slid 1.07 percent to 90 dinars.
Chemical firm Al-Kimia fell 2.3 percent to 41.9 dinars.
